Package eu.tivian.gui

Class Palette

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.gui.Palette
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Color>
    public class Palette
extends Object
implements Iterable<Color>
    Commodore 16 palette.
    Based on Colodore.
    Since:
    2019-12-03
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Kania, Pepto
    See Also:
    Colodore source code, TED System Hardware Manual about video output

      • get

        public Color get​(int i)
        Returns i-th color in the palette.
        Parameters:
        i - index of the color in the palette
        Returns:
        Color object of the requested palette color
        Throws:
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the i parameter is out of range (i ≤ 0 || i ≥ 121)

        Calculates the gamma from PAL to sRGB value.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
